scripts.ci: npm-run-all clean generate-json-api compile lint coverage
scripts.generate-json-api: json2ts -i ./resources/sap-ui-library-api.json -o ./src/api-json.d.ts --no-unknownAny --bannerComment "/* eslint-disable @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any */ /* This file is automatically generated. DO NOT MODIFY IT BY HAND. Instead, modify the source JSONSchema file (sap-ui-library-api.json) and run generate-json-api from the package.json to regenerate this file. */" && prettier --write ./src/api-json.d.ts
